reviewText: Enjoyed it very much,would like to see other DVDS made by categories like one with only healing scriptures or one with faith scriptures etc.

We watch this on Roku but it gets hung a lot.  Maybe alot of people jam their servers at night.  So I pop this in the dvd player and we're in business.  We love to listen to this as we sleep.  It's so peaceful. And while rocking the baby at night I can read this to myself or out loud to her with calm music playing.

Bible Screen on DVD is a wonderful product.  I like to leave it up and running on my computer screen at all times when busy about the house or working in my office at home.  I find it a constant source of encouragement on hectic days when heavy workloads and trials of everyday life seem to be getting the best of me.  A great help when time to meditate on God's Holy Word!
The slides and music on this application are OUTSTANDING! It can be used for enhancing the atmosphere of almost anywhere!
